---
name: Visual Event Categorization
about: Add color-coded or icon-based categorization for activities/events
labels: enhancement
---

**Describe the feature**
Implement visual cues (such as color-coding or icons) for different activity/event categories (e.g., sports, academics, arts) throughout the UI, including the activity list and any map views.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Each activity/event displays a visual indicator of its category
- Consistent use of colors/icons across the UI
- Legend or explanation for users

**Additional context**
This will make it easier for users to quickly identify event types.
